pages.title: General Tips
pages.text: Items that contain NBT data should be $(n)stored separately from your AE2 system$(). We recommend having Sophisticated Storage barrels or chests for keeping your NBT items. $(br2)Commonly accessed items such as tools or armor can be kept in your backpack or enderchest.

pages.title: What is NBT data?
pages.text: NBT is the format used by Minecraft to attach extra information to items. To tell if an item has NBT, you can press $(l)F3+H$() to toggle advanced tooltips.$(br2)Common examples of items with NBT include weapons, armor, enchanted books, and other sorts of gear and equipment.

pages.title: Illegal Connections
pages.text: Applied Energistics 2 is a powerful mod for storage, but having many networks in the server causes lag. $(br2)The following should $(l)not$() be used in connection with your AE2 system:
